name: IronClaw Identity Audit
description: Agent queries and validates its own git identity, SSH connectivity, and token freshness using RemoteJuggler tools
process: List all available identities with juggler_list_identities(provider='all')
Validate SSH connectivity for bot identity with juggler_validate(identity='rj-agent-bot')
Query credential access audit with juggler_audit_log(count=20)
Report findings: identity drift, expired tokens, signing issues
